StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetWaiverLevelsForType]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
(@WaiverCategoryID int ,@WaiverTypeID int)
AS
SELECT DISTINCT wl.WAIVER_LEVEL_ID AS ID, wl.WAIVER_LEVEL_CODE + ' - ' + wl.WAIVER_LEVEL_DESC AS Descrip.on, wl.WAIVER_LEVEL_CODE AS Code, wl.IsAc.ve FROM WAIVER w WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN WAIVER_LEVEL wl ON w.WAIVER_CATEGORY_ID = @WaiverCategoryID AND w.WAIVER_TYPE_ID = @WaiverTypeID AND wl.WAIVER_LEVEL_ID = w.WAIVER_LEVEL_ID AND wl.WAIVER_LEVEL_CODE <> '0'
